name: rainbow-bracket
description: A customizable extension for colorizing matching brackets and make your code amazing.

RainbowBrackets.timeOut.description: How long the user should idle for, before the document is colorized. Set to 0 to disable

RainbowBrackets.forceUniqueOpeningColor.description: Ensure that an opening brackets color does not match a previous brackets color

RainbowBrackets.forceIterationColorCycle.description: Should opening brackets iterate the color cycle even if they are not nested

RainbowBrackets.colorMode.description: Should different brackets share a color group (Consecutive), or use their own color group (Independent)

RainbowBrackets.highlightActiveScope.description: Should the active scope brackets always be highlighted? Recommended to disable editor.matchBrackets if using this feature.

RainbowBrackets.activeScopeCSS.description: CSS for the active scope. Use {color} to match the bracket color. The string types listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions can be used

RainbowBrackets.showBracketsInGutter.description: Show active bracket scope in gutter?

RainbowBrackets.showBracketsInRuler.description: Show active bracket scope in ruler?

RainbowBrackets.rulerPosition.description: Show active bracket scope in ruler?

RainbowBrackets.showVerticalScopeLine.description: Show a vertical line on the left side of the editor representing the active bracket scope?

RainbowBrackets.showHorizontalScopeLine.description: Show a horizontal line to create a block around the active bracket scope?

RainbowBrackets.scopeLineRelativePositio.description: True: Scope Line will start from the ending bracket position. False: Scope Line will always be at column 0

RainbowBrackets.scopeLineCSS.description: CSS for the scope line. Use {color} to match the bracket color. The string types listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions can be used

RainbowBrackets.consecutivePairColors.description: Define paired characters and their shared color group

RainbowBrackets.independentPairColors.description: Define paired characters and their color groups

RainbowBrackets.excludedLanguages.description: Don't colorize files of these languages
